participant_2.background:
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.
i wish i could live in iceland.
I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia.
i have a dog.
I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

content.text: Hey, what do you like to do for fun?
I love going to comic con and meeting people who share my passion for comics. I also love to skate.
I have a dog too, she's a great companion.
That's awesome! I love dogs, they're the best. I also love making jewelry, it's a great way to express my creativity.
That's cool, I'm not very crafty but I do enjoy fishing.
I've never been fishing before, but it sounds like it could be fun.
It's really relaxing, you should give it a try sometime.
I will, thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! What's your favorite comic book series?
I'm a big fan of the X-Men, they're my favorite superheroes.
I love the X-Men too! They're such a great team.
Yeah, they're the best. I'm so glad I got to meet the creators of the series at comic con, it was an amazing experience.
That's awesome! I'm jealous, I've always wanted to meet the creators of my favorite comics.
It was definitely a once in a lifetime experience.
It sounds like it. I'm glad you had a good time.
